title: UCANBE Athena Face Body Paint Oil Palette, Professional Flash Non Toxic Safe Tattoo Halloween FX Party Artist Fancy Makeup Painting Kit For Kids and Adult
descriptions:
Unleash your creativity with the UCANBE Athena Face Body Paint Oil Palette! This professional makeup kit is perfect for kids and adults alike, making it ideal for Halloween, FX, parties, artists, and more. With 20 vibrant colors including gold, silver, pink, and more, you can create a variety of looks such as crowns, costumes, bruises, blood, and cosplay.

The oil-based, non-toxic formula is skin-friendly, comfortable to wear, and quick-drying. It's easy to blend, smudge-proof, durable, and minimally rubs off. Plus, it's easy to wash off with olive oil or professional waterproof makeup remover, making cleanup a breeze.

Whether you're heading to a festival, carnival, birthday party, campfire, theme party, stage performance, or Halloween event, this palette has got you covered.
